import React from 'react'; import { postArray } from './Array.jsx' import './scss/Article.scss' import { FullArticleText } from './Article_text.jsx' import crown from './img/icons/crown.svg' import facebook from './img/social/facebook-grey.svg' import twitter from './img/social/twitter-grey.svg' import linkedin from './img/social/linkedin-grey.svg' import linkIcon from './img/icons/link.svg' function createMarkup(i) { return { __html: `
${postArray[i].author} ⋅ ${postArray[i].dataCreated} ⋅ 1 min

${postArray[i].articleTitle}

${postArray[i].shortTxt}

${FullArticleText}
${postArray[i].viewCnt} views 0 comments
${postArray[i].likeCnt}
`}; } function MyComponent(i) { return ( <>

) ; } export const Article0 = () => { return ( MyComponent(0) ) } export const Article1 = () => { return ( MyComponent(1) ) } export const Article2 = () => { return ( MyComponent(2) ) } export const Article3 = () => { return ( MyComponent(3) ) } export const Article4 = () => { return ( MyComponent(4) ) } export const Article5 = () => { return ( MyComponent(5) ) }
